title.en: Development of Public Services in Healthcare and Welfare Sector
title.et: Avalike teenuste arendamine tervishoiu- ja hoolekande sektoris

structural_units.address:
Ringi 35

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course gives an overview of the central principles of the functioning of the public sector, the specificities and principles of the development of public services in the healthcare and welfare sector.
description.et: Aine annab ülevaate avaliku sektori toimimise kesksetest põhimõtetest, avalike teenuste arendamise eripäradest ning põhimõtetest tervishoiu- ja hoolekande sektoris.

objectives.en: The course aims at providing students with knowledge of the principles for the development of public services and the basis for the organisation of public services.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on anda teadmised avalike teenuste arendamise põhimõtetest ning avalike teenuste korraldamise alustest.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) know the general principles of the functioning of the public sector and its impact on the development and supply of services;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) teab avaliku sektori toimimise üldpõhimõtteid ja selle mõju teenuste arendamisele ja pakkumisele;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) understand the specificities of the development of public services in the healthcare and welfare sector;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) mõistab avalike teenuste arendamise eripärasid tervishoiu- ja hoolekande sektoris;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) be able to develop public services in the healthcare and welfare sector.
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab arendada avalikke teenuseid tervishoiu- ja hoolekande sektoris.
